transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji madam, IndiaMART bahut badhiya kaam kar rahe hain, kya mamla hai?
Executive: Sir, kahan se baat kar rahe hain? Nirman Communication?
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Ji sir, good morning. Bataiye sir.
Customer: Ye subah subah Hisar ki ek interactive panel ki lead aayi, to wo lead mujhe mili. Agar contact kiya to humne le liya to hamara kyun nuksan karwate hain?
Executive: Sir kya ho gaya bataiye?
Customer: Ye lead jo aayi hai.
Executive: Haanji Hisar. Puch kiya.
Customer: Aur aaya mere pass aur usne purchase bhi kar liya aur uske baad mere pass aaya.
Executive: Lekin aap sir dekhiye us cheez mein agar aap kahin na kahin dekhenge to usme IndiaMART ka fault nahi hai na?
Customer: Ab wo client agar baad mein price check karne ke liye aa raha hai ya kisi bhi wajah se IndiaMART pe dobara aa raha hai, to us cheez ke liye to sir IndiaMART ko aap doshi nahi keh sakte na? Aap mujhe khud bataiye. Aisa to nahi hai ki
Customer: Aisi pehli shikayat aise aise logon ki sankhya mere pass hi kyun badh rahi hai?
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai ki aap hi ke pass badh rahi hai. Wo to dekho buylead to aap khud hi select karte ho na. To buylead to aapne khud hi choice kari hai na apne liye wo. Aapne to uthaya us buylead ko. Khud sochiye, hai na? Aisa nahi hai sir.
Customer: Sir dekhiye aap ek cheez samjhiye ye
Executive: Dekhiye main aapko formula ek ek formula aapko batata hun business ka.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Theek hai. Main koi sirf ye nahi hun ki main Haryana mein agar baitha hun aur aap utha ke Palwal kar rahe hain to meri bahut badi property ka bhi main ek jagirdar bhi hun. Theek hai. Agar mere mere kheton mein agar puri ki puri fasal kharab hai aur main uska ek rate dal deta hun aur usko kehta hun ki bhai sahab isme se chun lo jo badhiya hai ye rate main aapko de raha hun. Wo kya chun lega sade hue malon mein se?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Lekin sir aapko ek cheez samajhna padega.
Customer: Bhai aaj ke aap ek cheez aap se aap aap ek cheez dusri samajhiye. As a business jo main kar raha hun CCTV camera mein. Ek product hai STQC verify aur ek hai non STQC verify ek hi company ka aur ek imported product hai jo ki company ke har rate ko tod ke alag hata dega. Ab isme client kya mangta hai mujhe jo mangta hai STQC mein mang raha hai product wo pad raha hai use ₹1 lakh ka aur jo main de raha hun ₹26000 ka. Feature uske andar same hai. Ab uski demand hai ki agar wo jata hai nahi brand mein jata hai to brand ka paisa wo dega. Aur agar brand mein nahi jata hai to non brand ke andar main wahi cheez usko de raha hun. Do option hai ya to wo brand mein jayega. To main option ke andar agar main IndiaMART pe hun ki bhai mujhe IndiaMART pe hi kaam karna hai to IndiaMART is tarah ka option dalega mere samne?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART aapke samne is tarike ke options nahi dalega. Koi IndiaMART mein koi person baith kar ke aapko leads nahi bhej raha hai ki uski aapse koi personal grudges hai. To isliye wo aapko bekar leads bhej raha hai. Aisa nahi hota sir. IndiaMART ek open platform hai aapko ye cheez samajhni padegi. Aapke keywords matching hoti hai.
Customer: IndiaMART open open platform kitna hai wo main bahut achi tarah se samajhta hun. IndiaMART ka hisab kitab kya baithta hai category wise. Uske andar category dali gayi hai TrustSeal ki category minute aur second mein hoti hai TrustSeal ki hisab kitab isme agar main dekhun kisi bhi month mein to kisi month mein aaya hai aur kisi month mein nahi aaya hai. Ghanta do ghante 6 ghante baad ki lead kya genuine hoti hai? Bilkul nahi hoti hai. Aur pehle wahi agar embassy ke upar lead hoti thi 18-18 ghante ki lead confirm hoti thi.
Executive: Sir wo aur abhi to aur aur ab abhi condition ye hai ki lead le lo banda ya to bolega main price check kar raha tha. Price check karne mein zamana ye 2025 nahi hai madam. Ya price check karne mein to logon ke pasine uske andar pasine unke utar jate hain. Puchte hain na mujhe mujhe call karke bhi karte hain sir H9C de do. Kyun bhej deta hun main Amazon pe IndiaMART pe koi bhi supplier kyun nahi bech pa raha usko?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir but ye aapka wrong mindset hai ki agar aapko aisa lag raha hai ki TrustSeal mein 4 ghante purani lead bekar hoti hai aur wahi lead MDC mein achi hoti hai. Buylead kabhi bhi different nahi hoti hai. MDC, TrustSeal, maximizer, star supplier, leading supplier sabke pass same buyleads jati hain sir.
Customer: Agar aapko ye wali cheez nahi pata hai to main bata deti hun.
Executive: Aapka aapka aapka formula hai aapko jo pata hai aap uske hisab se mujhe bata rahi hain. Itne saal utne kitni dafa maine call kiya hoga leadon se related aur leadon ke related mein maine kya dekha hai kya jana hai wo mera apna experience hai IndiaMART ke sath. IndiaMART pe kahani wahi hai ki IndiaMART ek hisab se chalti hai aur ek hisab mein baad mein dheere dheere wo down hoti chali jati hai. Aur down hone ke hisab se pure saal ke andar dekhun to up hua hi nahi hai down hua kab hai?
Executive: Sir aisa kuch samajh mein nahi aata ki leede ho kya rahi hain. Mahine ke andar budget dekhe mahine mein 300-400 leede use hui. Itne logon ne call kiya. Kya call kiya? Rate pata karne ke liye call kiya. Kya call kiya? Kya leede uthai humne? Apna jo uske andar leadon ka consume hai wo lead humne consume kar di. Kyun consume kar di? Kyunki wo free mein aa rahi thi monthly hafte mein ja rahi thi. Isliye humne use kar di. Natija kya nikla? Jisse baat kar rahe hain ya to IndiaMART pe chadhai kar lo aur ya phir ya phir jo client call kar raha hai usko block karke rakh do.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai. Ye kya system ye ye kya system bana rakha hai aapne? Agar AI ke through sari cheeze AI ke through sari cheeze agar pakadti hain ki nahi ji ye pakad raha hai Haryana aur ye pakad raha hai ye to baki cheezon mein AI kyun nahi pakad raha? Ki as a client kis way pe uski lead ko uske upar submit kar rahe hain ki bhai price check karne ke liye jo uske upar lead feed kar raha hai wo apni inquiry kya puri company dal raha hai? Ye kyun chahiye use? Jis tarah hum aaj ki date mein kisi client ka phone aata hai project ke andar uski puri khabar lete hain aap kya uske upar lead ke upar dal rahe hain ki kya uski genuine inquiry hai ya rate kya kya kya uske andar rate pata karne ke liye wo aa raha hai? Market mein chahiye kya kisi buyer ko? Kisi buyer ko saste se sasta product chahiye aur yahan mahange se mahanga to hum de nahi rahe saste se sasta de rahe hain uske baad bhi banda rate pata karne ke liye aa raha hai.
Executive: Sun hi nahi rahe hain. Sir genuinity aap kaise pata kar sakte hain kisi ki aap mujhe bata dijiye na. Agar koi ye bol raha hai ha bhai mujhe kharidna hai aur wo IndiaMART pe buylead post kar raha hai to hum pehle se kaise bata de ki wo kharidne nahi aa raha hai wo sirf price lene aa raha hai aap bataiye mujhe is baat ka aap jawab dijiye.
Customer: Madam ye jo aap lead generate karti hain na iske upar iske upar verify karke lead ko lijiye na. Ye to bhai kisi ko nahi pata samne wale ke dimag mein kya chal raha hai. Magar jo aapki genuinity jo aapki possibility hai usko to pura full of kariye use.
Executive: Kar ke hi de rahe hain ye verify.
Customer: Kai kai client aise aate hain jo kehte hain ki nahi ji humne dala hi nahi. To wo bhi ek case hai wo bhi ek kalesh hai ki wo samne jhoot bol raha hai bilkul bina dale kaise pad jayega?
Executive: Sir wahi cheez aapko samajhni padegi ki ab us client ne jisne apna GST tak verify karaya hai kai baar wo client bhi bol dete hain maine nahi dala to unka GST number kaun aa kar ke dal gaya? Ab sir hum ye hum India mein rehte hain sir dekhiye yahan par hum clients ko na to guess kar sakte hain na kuch kar sakte hain aur aap verify ki baat kar rahe hain to jitni bhi leads aapke pass aati hai wo sab verified hi ho ke aati hai. Koi bhi without verified lead hum aapko aise nahi send karte hain sir.
Customer: Dekh lijiye madam jo isme kuch ho sakta hai to isko theek thak kariye agar kahin pe koi galti hai koi minus hai to usko dekhiye usko hisab kitab uske andar kyunki is tarah ka man ke chaliye magajmari subah subah banda ye bole ki nahi ji main to le liya maine phir lead dali hai. To ab tumne le liya to lead kyun dali bhai?
Executive: Sir dekhiye ye wala question aap sabse pehle to usse hi put karte ki jab aapne le liya tha sir to phir aapne dala hi kyun?
Customer: Madam itna magajmari wo galti hamari hai hum IndiaMART pe baithe pade hain. Rate pata karne ke liye to kisi ko sasta product chahiye hota hai to IndiaMART pe aata hai. Aur uske baad bhi wo uske upar uske upar bhi rate aata hai. IndiaMART market mein chal kyun rahi hai kyunki saste sasta product ye de diye wo product de diye jahan pe man ke chaliye logon ke pasine utar jayenge. To wo product yahan pe competition ke andar sasta ja raha hai. Aur uske baad bhi uske andar saste mein kya ja raha hai uske andar magajmari ja rahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam dekhiye isme kuch ho sakta hai to theek nahi ho sakta to mujhe bata dijiyega. Theek hai?
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is upset about receiving bad buyleads.

- Feels IndiaMART is causing him losses.

- Believes leads are not genuine and only for price checking.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART is an open platform.

- Clarified leads are based on keyword matching.

- Stated all leads are verified before sending.



Next Steps: 

- Customer asked to fix the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, genuineness, verification, price
